title: What time are the Roland Garros semi-finals?
description: The highly anticipated Roland Garros semi-finals will take place Friday, when Carlos Alcaraz will continue his title defence against in-form Italian Lorenzo Musetti and the No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings, Jannik Sinner, will battle 24-time major champion Novak Djokovic in their ninth Lexus ATP Head2Head meeting. View featured Friday matches below. Court Philippe-Chatrier From 2:30 p.m. [2] Carlos Alcaraz vs. [8] Lorenzo Musetti Not Before 7 p.m. [1] Jannik Sinner vs. [6] Novak Djokovic  Court Suzanne-Lenglen From 11 a.m. (Men's Wheelchair Singles) [1] Tokito Oda vs. [3] Martin De La Puente Not Before 12 p.m. (Men's Doubles) [8] Joe Salisbury/Neal Skupski vs. [9] Christian Harrison/Evan King   View Full Order Of Play Here Read More Ahead Of The Roland Garros SFs Preview: Alcaraz peaking for Musetti matchup in RG SFs Preview: Sinner & Djokovic chase history in RG blockbuster Sinner, Musetti & the acceleration of tennis’ Italian renaissance [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Roland Garros

Alcaraz to play Musetti, Sinner to face Djokovic

June 05, 2025

Julian Finney/Getty Images)

Roland Garros is the second Grand Slam tournament of the season. By ATP Staff

The highly anticipated Roland Garros semi-finals will take place Friday, when Carlos Alcaraz will continue his title defence against in-form Italian Lorenzo Musetti and the No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings, Jannik Sinner, will battle 24-time major champion Novak Djokovic in their ninth Lexus ATP Head2Head meeting.

View featured Friday matches below.

Court Philippe-Chatrier
From 2:30 p.m.
[2] Carlos Alcaraz vs. [8] Lorenzo Musetti

Not Before 7 p.m.
[1] Jannik Sinner vs. [6] Novak Djokovic 

Court Suzanne-Lenglen
From 11 a.m.
(Men's Wheelchair Singles) [1] Tokito Oda vs. [3] Martin De La Puente

Not Before 12 p.m.
(Men's Doubles) [8] Joe Salisbury/Neal Skupski vs. [9] Christian Harrison/Evan King

View Full Order Of Play Here
